Package controller

Class AlbumViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.SceneController
controller.AlbumViewController
public class AlbumViewController extends SceneController
Main controller of the Album View.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    AlbumViewController.AlbumPaneController
    Main controller of each Album in the Album View.
    static class 
    AlbumViewController.PhotoPaneController
    Controller of a photo that is created from a search.

      Initializes a new Album View.
      Parameters:

    • setListStateToPhotos

      private void setListStateToPhotos​(boolean showPhotos)
      Changes which observable list the tilepane reads from.
      Parameters:
      showPhotos - boolean to determine if we show photos or albums in the list

      private void updateSearchBar()
      Uses the selected field of the search filter to determine which input fields to display.

      Creates an album from the search results.

      Switches the scene to the Login View

      Closes the program.

    • createAlbum

      private void createAlbum()
      Creates a basic, empty album.

    • createAlbumInteral

      private AlbumViewController.AlbumPaneController createAlbumInteral​(String name, Iterator<Photo> photosToAdd)
      Handles the internal process of creating a new album. Displays an error message if no name is given in the pop-up dialog or a duplicate name is found.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the Album
      photosToAdd - Photos to add into the album
      Returns:
      the created AlbumPaneController

    • parseTagSearch

      private HashMap<String,​String> parseTagSearch()
      Parses a tag search
      Returns:
      a Map that contains the tag-value pairs (NOTE: the value of the tag is the key, so it is stored as value-tag)

    • searchAlbumsByTag

      private void searchAlbumsByTag()
      Searches through all albums within the user by a given tag-value pair and displays all matches. Displays an error if the input could not be parsed.

    • searchAlbumsByDate

      public void searchAlbumsByDate()
      Searches through all albums within the user by date range.

    • clearDates

      private void clearDates()
      Clears the date fields

    • loadPhoto

      private void loadPhoto​(Photo p, ArrayList<Photo> visited)
      Loads the photo into view and creates a corresponding controller object. Adds the photo the list of visited photos to prevent duplicates in the view.
      Parameters:
      p - the photo to load
      visited - the list of photos that have been previously loaded

    • duplicateNameFound

      private boolean duplicateNameFound​(String name)
      Checks whether a name is already used by an album within the user
      Parameters:
      name - we want to check for
      Returns:
      whether or not the name is in use

    • requestAlbumOpen

      public void requestAlbumOpen​(Album a)
      Switches to the photo view a selected album.
      Parameters:
      a - the selected album

    • editAlbumName

      public String editAlbumName​(String oldName)
      Edits the name of a given album
      Parameters:
      oldName - the previous name of the album prior to changing
      Returns:
      the new name of the album, if the name is permitted; otherwise null

    • deleteAlbum

      public void deleteAlbum​(AlbumViewController.AlbumPaneController apc, javafx.scene.Node root)
      Deletes the selected album.
      Parameters:
      apc - controller attached to the album
      root - root node of the pane that is stored in the list
